BeepBoop.NAME: Beep Boop
BeepBoop.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Focus affects Beep Boop !M! times.
BeepBoop.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Focus affects Beep Boop !M! times.

Masochism.NAME: Masochism
Masochism.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! more damage each time you lose HP in combat.
Masochism.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! more damage each time you lose HP in combat.

Revenge.NAME: Revenge
Revenge.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your missing HP.

StaunchBleeding.NAME: Staunch Bleeding
StaunchBleeding.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP from a card, NL gain 1 Regen.
